decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted  therewith SOS924/X01, SOS924/X03, SOS924/OD01 Rev C, SOS924/OD02 Rev C,  SOS924/OD03 Rev C, SOS924/OD04 Rev A, SOS924/OD06 Rev A, SOS924/OD07 Rev A, SOS924/OD08 Rev B,  SOS924/OD09 Rev A, SOS924/OD10 Rev A, SOS924/OD13, SOS924/OD14, SOS924/OD15,  SOS924/OD16,  DFC1328_TSP, DFC1328_TPP, AL3661/1.1/01G and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The development shall be constructed in accordance with the materials and details approved in application 01054/537A/P3(3) prior to the occupation of the development.
Condition : 4 - The parking and accesses should be provided as specified in the application prior to the occupation of the development.
Condition : 5 - The landscaping shall be provided as specified in application 01054/537A/P3(5) prior to the occupation of the development.
Condition : 6 - The boundary treatment shall be provided as specified prior to the occupation of the dwelling and shall be retained in that form for as long as the development remains in existence.

Condition : 7 - The windows shall be provided as specified in the application prior to the occupation of the development and shall be retained in that form for as long as the development remains in existence.

Condition : 8 - Prior to first occupation of the building, a Code for Sustainable Homes Final (Post-Construction) Certificate, issued by the BRE (or equivalent accredited body), must be submitted to the Local Planning Authority to demonstrate that Level 4 has been achieved. All the measures integrated shall be retained for as long as the development is in existence.

Condition : 9 - The development shall be built in accordance with the recommendations in the Energy Strategy approved by the Local Planning Authority as amended by the Energy Statement (Detailed Design Stage) produced by Upton McGougan Limited dated February 2014.

Condition : 10 - In this condition "retained tree" means an existing tree which is to be retained in accordance with the approved plans and particulars; and paragraphs (a) and (b) below shall have effect until the expiration of (5 years?) from (the date of the occupation of the building for its permitted use).

(a)	No retained tree shall be cut down, uprooted or destroyed, nor shall any retained tree be topped or lopped other than in accordance with the approved plans and particulars, without the written approval of the local planning authority.  Any topping or lopping approved shall be carried out in accordance with British Standard[3998 (Tree Work)] or any other BS replacing.

(b)	If any retained tree is removed, uprooted or destroyed or dies, another tree shall be planted at the same place and that tree shall be of such size and species, and shall be planted at such time, as may be specified in writing by the local planning authority.

(c)	The erection of fencing for the protection of any retained tree shall be undertaken in accordance with the approved plans and particulars before any equipment, machinery or materials are brought on to the site for the purposes of the development, and shall be maintained until all equipment, machinery and surplus materials have been removed from the site.  Nothing shall be stored or placed in any area fenced in accordance with this condition and the ground levels within those areas shall not be altered, nor shall any excavation be made, without the written consent of the local planning authority.
Condition : 11 - The paths in the garden shall be constructed from no-dig techniques as specified in the application.

Condition : 12 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the scheme for external illumination of the site, mud and other loose materials and measures to minimise dust nuisance approved under application 01054/537A/P3(12).

Condition : 13 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 14 - During the course of the development:
a. The Local Planning Authority shall be notified immediately if additional contamination is discovered during the course of the development. A competent person shall assess the additional contamination, and shall submit appropriate amendments to the scheme for decontamination in writing to the Local Planning Authority for approval before any work on that aspect of development continues.
Before the development is first brought into use:
b. The agreed scheme for decontamination referred to in clauses b) and c) above, including amendments, shall be fully implemented and a written validation (closure) report submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval.

Condition : 15 - Prior to the occupation of the development  refuse and recycling bins shall be provided and installed in accordance with the current Local Authority requirements (1 x estate recycling frame, 1 x 1100 litre cardboard bin, 1 x 1100 litre mixed plastic packaging bin and 3 x 1100 litre standard euro bins).

Condition : 16 - Prior to the occupation of the development the measures contained within the scheme for protecting the proposed residential accommodation from external noise approved in application 01054/537A/P3(16,17) shall be implemented

Condition : 17 - Prior to the occupation of the development the measures contained within the scheme to protect the proposed residential accommodation/residents from poor air quality, shall be implemented in accordance with approved application 01054/537A/P3(18).
description: Variation of condition 9 (Energy Strategy) of planning permission 01054/537A/P3 dated 04/01/2013 for the demolition of existing buildings and erection of a three storey building comprising 36 residential flats and provision of car and cycle parking, landscaping, amenity space, fencing and refuse storage.
